mechanics.condition: Creature visible within range fails Constitution saving throw

mechanics.outcome: Poison Spray's damage increases by 1d12 (total 2d12 poison damage)
Poison Spray's damage increases by an additional 1d12 (total 3d12 poison damage)
Poison Spray's damage increases by an additional 1d12 (total 4d12 poison damage)

description_text: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage. This spell's damage increases by 1d12 when you reach 5th level (2d12), 11th level (3d12), and 17th level (4d12).
